meanings.definition: A style of animation that originated in Japan and has become popular worldwide.
meanings.sent1: Many children enjoy watching animes on television.
meanings.sent2: My friend collects animes on DVD.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed fascinated by the colorful animes on the screen.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she watched the vibrant animes come to life.
meanings.sent5: The animes filled the room with excitement and wonder.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'anime'.
meanings.sent1: She owns a collection of different animes.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore had a sale on various animes.
meanings.sent3: Their shelves were overflowing with animes of all genres.
meanings.sent4: The room echoed with the sound of flipping through pages of animes.
meanings.sent5: The animes lined up neatly on the shelf, waiting to be explored.
